attributes.action: Reinstate the former road layout at the Sir Francis Drake roundabout. Tavistock, Devon.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the residence of Tavistock, Devon and the residence of its outlying districts and road user’s who commute through the town, call upon the British Government to force West Devon Borough Council, Tavistock District Council and the South West Highways Department to reinstate the former road layout at the Sir Francis Drake roundabout within the town.

It is our belief that the current new road layout is a cause of greater danger to road users and pedestrians alike. That it causes even great tailbacks of traffic and longer delays than previous, and that good road management is about easing congestion not making it worse, particularly in an area of such historic importance.
